model.elements

Class NicholasCage

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.elements.GameElement
      • model.elements.KillableGameElement
        • model.elements.NicholasCage

  • public class NicholasCage
extends KillableGameElement
    An individual moving boss unit, which is orbited by Cages. This unit can only lose lives when all of it's cages are gone.
